name: Reva Agro & Fisheries
desc: Reva Agro & Fisheries is a client-based freelance project where I developed a modern and responsive business website to enhance the companyâ€™s online presence. The website was designed to showcase their agriculture products and fisheries services in a professional and user-friendly manner. I implemented smooth navigation, structured service sections, and a contact inquiry feature to help customers easily connect with the business. The project focused on delivering a clean UI, mobile compatibility, and an improved user experience using technologies like HTML, CSS and React.js.
